negotiation_message: Alice said in round 1: Hi Lingyao, based on the values of the items, I propose that I take the 2 books (which are worth 8 points total to me) and you can have the 2 hats and 2 balls. That way, we can both get some value out of this negotiation. Let me know what you think!
Lingyao replied in round 1: Book is the most valuable item for me. How about split it with each of us having 1 book. Hats and balls are less valuable to me.

Alice said in round 2: That's a fair point about wanting to split the books since they are valuable to both of us. How about this revised proposal: I take 1 book and 1 ball, and you take 1 book, 1 ball, and the 2 hats. That way we each get 1 of the valuable books, and the total points are split more evenly between us. I'm okay with you having the hats since they aren't worth any points to me. Let me know your thoughts on this split!
Lingyao replied in round 2: halt negotiation
